name: Earth Mote's Stability
benefit: Whenever you make an Athletics check to perform a long jump, you can jump 1 square farther than your Athletics check indicates, and your jump can exceed your speed by 1 square. In addition, whenever you make a saving throw to avoid falling, you receive a +4 feat bonus to that roll. If you have the Student of the Plague feat, your long jumps can exceed your speed by 2 squares, and the bonus to saving throws to avoid falling increases to +6.
